short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Twitch.tv to help you create, store and paste your creative pastas. Kappa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
v.0.1.6
Added support of sites that put twitch chat in the iframe, like multistre.am and others.

Description

Current functionality:
- Create, edit and store text lines
- Sort items in storage by dragging
- Append or paste in chat box
- Show global and subscriber emotes

In future:
- Better support of popout chat
- Load BTTV and FFZ emotes
- Dynamic update of emote sets
